Keywords: Future , Horsemen , Quiet Council , X-Men
Real Name: Krakoa
Special Powers
TARGETING: Hindering, Blocking
SIMULACRA BODY CONNECTED TO KRAKOA: If Krakoa is 40 points, he is KO'd when he crosses the red line. // Protected: Pulse Wave.
STRATEGICALLY-PLACED SAFE HAVENS: At the beginning of the game, generate 5 Safe Haven hindering terrain markers anywhere on the map at least 5 squares from any starting area and each other. // Friendly characters with the X-Men keyword that are adjacent to Krakoa or occupy one of his Safe Haven markers have "POWER: Place this character adjacent to Krakoa or in the square of one of his Safe Haven markers." // Friendly characters with the X-Men keyword have [Improved Movement: Hindering].
THE LIVING ISLAND OF REFUGE FOR MUTANTKIND: Phasing/Teleport, Poison. Smoke Cloud as FREE.
MAINTAIN ALL THAT CYPHER WAS: When an opposing character within range uses Outwit, Perplex or Probability Control, Krakoa can use that power until the end of your next turn.

Comments
October 12, 2022
tidge
The low-cost version of Krakoa has some new opportunities to use more of his tricks (such as long-range FREE Smoke Cloud) along with more recently released figures. The Safe Haven markers are not what I would rely on for offense, but with certain "free move" figures (inherent, or granted from another source) there could be some long-range movement (under peculiar circumstances). Support is usually not a game-winning strategy, but with some self-healing figures that are otherwise difficult to KO (ehem, XoS OP Fury) taking an action to pop between Safe Have Markers could be very annoying.
August 5, 2022
Slicktrickyrick
6.3a Adjacency and Game Elements Adjacent game elements are those occupying adjacent squares. A game element is never adjacent to the square it occupies or itself. Krakoa is a friendly characters with the X-Men keyword, so if he occupies one of his Safe Haven markers, Krakoa has POWER: Place Krakoa in the square of one of his Safe Haven markers. Krakoa could be given a costed MOVE action from his trait, The Living Island of Refuge For Mutantkind, to Phase / Teleport to any Safe Haven marker with in 13 squares, top dial, with improved movement: characters, elevated and blocking.
August 4, 2022
JustADad
Question on this guy. Is he able to personally teleport to one of his portals, using a power, without having to be on a portal prior? I know adjacent characters can, but what about ole Krakoa himself? I assume I can spend a power for him to teleport to a portal, but I want to gain clarity on whether or not he has to be on/in a portal already, prior to teleporting with the power cost.
January 3, 2022
Disasstah
They'd have to sidestep or move out of the safe haven token for everyone to move onto it.
November 26, 2021
Redrover454
So if you win map roll with Krakoa on your force, you not only get to pick map but you can then POWER action put 4 X-Men only 5-6 squares from your opponent's start before they've even taken an action? That's bonkers. You can immediately set up some nasty kill-boxes with this guy. Just deploy 2 RaF Emma Frosts and your opponent is trapped in their start zone.
April 10, 2021
FearandFangs
I feel like Krakoa kinda got slept on in this set due to the other cool chases but between his super affordable nature and the insanely awesome teleportation of x-men keyword pieces is pretty amazing
